item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - API incident notification
item.description:
Nov 26, 14:43 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/11/2024 02:50 UTC
End time : 26/11/2024 14:05 UTC
Root cause : Incident due a misconfiguration on the network device.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 26, 10:53 UTC
Monitoring - LDP Public API is now fully up & running
Only the pay-as-you-go consumption report is now impacted, all other features work as expected.

A fix has been implemented and we are now monitoring the results.

Nov 26, 10:28 UTC
Identified - The services are more stable now, and our teams are continuing to work on the complete resolution.

Nov 26, 08:47 UTC
Investigating - Please be aware an incident is in progress on our Logs Data Platform offer. It this is currently affecting the functionality.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 26/11/2024 02:50 UTC
Service impact : Public API issue on Logs Data Platform service, customers are unable to create or modify their project during the incident.
Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Corporate websites] - OVHcloud community forum migration notification
item.description:
Nov 21, 07:36 UTC

All services are operational. There has been no impact since 21/11/2024 07:30 UTC.

New end time : 21/11/2024 08:00 UTC

Nov 18, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 15, 17:11 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on OVHcloud community forum.

This may temporarily affect functionality.

Start time : 18/11/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/11/2024 08:00 UTC
Service impact : OVHcloud community forum will be in read only mode during the migration.
Service improvement : In order to improve customer experience, we will migrate our OVHcloud community forum to a new platform (community.ovhcloud.com).

Our technical team ensure a smooth and seamless transition.
However, to perform some technical operations, the OVHcloud community forum will be in read only mode during the migration.

We understand that this may cause some inconvenience, and we appreciate your understanding and patience during this time.

item.title: [Global][Customer Service] Manager perturbation notification
item.description:
Nov 20, 15:18 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 19/11/2024 22:09 UTC
End time : 20/11/2024 01:25 UTC
Root cause : It was due to an update on a software. We have reverted to an earlier version.

We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 20, 01:47 UTC
Monitoring - We are pleased to inform you that the issue impacting your service has been resolved since 20/11/2024 01:25 UTC.
Thank you for your patience as our technical teams worked to find a solution.
We will continue to monitor the situation to ensure that everything stays running smoothly.

Nov 20, 01:01 UTC
Update - We are currently investigating the issue and our technical team is working assiduously to implement a solution.
We will provide an update as soon as we have made sufficient progress.

Nov 20, 00:35 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our dedicated servers offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the functionality.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 19/11/2024 22:09 UTC
Service impact : We regret to inform you that some customers may have encountered difficulties when ordering dedicated servers.
Ongoing actions : We are currently investigating the issue and our technical teams are working on a solution. We will provide an update as soon as we have made progress.
Related incident : https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/9m2zgpz8dv6q

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

This has no impact on your infrastructures health.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
